trans-unit.source: Manages the user interface (UI) for a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia a IU (interface do usuário) para um painel de marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: You can control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode controlar a exibição de seu designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> provides a straightforward interface for displaying the items for each component, including the following methods and events:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> Fornece uma interface simples para exibir os itens para cada componente, incluindo os seguintes métodos e eventos:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods display and hide the items for a component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> métodos exibir e ocultar os itens de um componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event indicates when the UI changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> evento indica quando a interface do usuário é alterado para um componente.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> to manage the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> collections associated with your component.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> para gerenciar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> coleções associados a seu componente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method to update a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> para atualizar o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a request is made to show or hide a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma solicitação é feita para mostrar ou ocultar um painel de marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the set of specialized classes associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista o conjunto de classes especializadas associado a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Specialized type
trans-unit.target: Tipo especializado

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: Adds information specific to smart tag panel management.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona informações específicas para o gerenciamento de painel de marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é especializada do <xref:System.EventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> with its handler.
trans-unit.target: Conecta-se a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> com seu manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Denotes whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o painel de marca inteligente está sendo exibido ou oculto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pela classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: O componente cujo painel de marcações inteligentes deve ser ocultada.

trans-unit.source: Hides the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Oculta o painel de marcações inteligentes para um componente.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently being displayed, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method will hide it.
trans-unit.target: Se o painel de marca inteligente é exibido no momento, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> método será ocultá-lo.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> evento estipular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide> como o tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> métodos são implementados apenas para gerar seus eventos correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade real foi encontrada nos manipuladores para esses eventos, que são parte do ambiente de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to refresh.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> a atualizar.

trans-unit.source: Updates the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o painel de marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method updates the internal `DesignerAction`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, as well as the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> método atualizará o interno `DesignerAction` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, bem como o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method to update a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> para atualizar o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to automatically show.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> a ser exibido automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to automatically show the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o painel de marcações inteligentes deve ser mostrado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically show the smart tag panel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para mostrar automaticamente o painel de marcações inteligentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: O componente cujo painel de marcações inteligentes deve ser mostrado.

trans-unit.source: Displays the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o painel de marcações inteligentes para um componente.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently hidden, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> method will display the panel.
trans-unit.target: Se o painel de marca inteligente está oculto no momento, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> método exibirá o painel.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> evento estipular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show> como o tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> métodos são implementados apenas para gerar seus eventos correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade real foi encontrada nos manipuladores para esses eventos, que são parte do ambiente de tempo de design.
